Title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
Writer: Andrew Birkin (screenplay), Bernd Eichinger (screenplay), Tom Tykwer (screenplay), Patrick Süskind (novel)
Actors: Ben Whishaw, Francesc Albiol, Gonzalo Cunill, Rachel Hurd-Wood
Plot: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.
Production: Constantin Film Produktion, Nouvelles Éditions de Films [fr], Castelao Producciones S.A.
